subject: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException + junit
msgSnippet: Hi, I m trying to use Junit but i encounter an error : java.lang.ClassNotFoundException Here is my code :
messageBody:
Hi,
I'm trying to use Junit but i encounter an error :
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

Here is my code :
<project name="JUNIT" default="Test-junit" basedir=".">

<property name="src.test.dir" value="extract/WEB-INF/src/test"/>
<property name="build.dir" value="classes"/>
<property name="junit.dir" value="/Java/JUNIT/junit.jar"/>
<property name="report.dir" value="report"/>
<property name="junit.out.dir.xml"
value="${report.dir}/junit/xml"/>

<property name="junit.jar" location="C:/Program Files/apache-ant-
1.6.2/lib/junit.jar"/>

<path id="classpath">
<pathelement location="${build.dir}" />
<pathelement location="${junit.jar}" />
</path>

<target name="init">
<delete dir="${junit.out.dir.xml}"/>
<mkdir dir="${junit.out.dir.xml}"/>
</target>

<target name="Test-junit" depends="init" description="unit test" >
<junit printsummary="yes" haltonfailure="no">
<formatter type="xml" />
<classpath refid="classpath"/>
<batchtest fork="yes" todir="${junit.out.dir.xml}">
<fileset dir="${src.test.dir}" includes="**/*Test.java"/>
</batchtest>
</junit>
</target>
</project>

Someone can help me to resolve the problem ?

Thanks in advance

Fred
